section.name: Application Profiles
section.p: An application profile is an immutable datastructure using to describe the configuration of a Java Virtual Machine deployment. The datastructure includes the following information:

ul.li: codebase URI (e.g. a part artifact or link)
basedir - the directory under which the virtual machine will be established
configuration uri - optional overriding configuration uri argument
application startup policy (MANUAL, AUTOMATIC, or DISABLED)
system properties to be supplied to the JVM on creation

section.p: Application profiles may be created using the Station CommandLine Handler and are used in conjuction with the Station management platform during the creation of runtime applications.
